name: Introduction to Conservation and Heritage
description: This course introduces students to the fundamentals of Conservation and Heritage in the context of Art History.

name: History of Conservation and Heritage
description: This course introduces students to the history of Conservation and Heritage as it relates to Art History.

name: Preservation Practices in Conservation and Heritage
description: This course introduces students to the various preservation practices in Conservation and Heritage.

name: Advanced Conservation and Heritage
description: This course introduces students to advanced topics in Conservation and Heritage.
prerequisites: Preservation Practices in Conservation and Heritage
